title: Context Management System
intro: It is a CMS for admin for seeing communication between Drones and mobiles. In this admin can see and control various things in real world. Also, Along with this CMS I have made a android application that will interact with CMS. I am also making IOT devices to interact with mobile through CMS which is in progress.
toolsAndTechnologies: Hibernate, Spring Boot, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Android, Java, Aurdino, websocket protocol
quote: Everything seems big before start and small after it ends.
